div.p: DAY, THE LAST 24 HOURS FOR THE WOUNDED WARRIOR AUCTION.
LOOK AT THIS. A WARRIOR POSTER SIGNED BY ALL
THE LIVING FIRST LADIES, INCLUDING NANCY REAGAN, WHO NO
LONGER SIGNS ANYTHING. SHE DID THIS FOR THE WOUNDED
SERVICE PEOPLE. INFORMATION ABOUT THE AUCTION ON
BILLOREILLY.COM. WE KNOW YOU CAN'T AFFORD, A LOT
OF PEOPLE CAN'T AFFORD THIS, BUT FOR A $25 DONATION US GET A
REPLICA OF THE POSTER, SUITABLE FOR FRAMING.
LET'S GET ON THIS, PEOPLE. NO BETTER CAUSE.
FACTOR TIP OF THE DAY. CHECK OUT THE FACTION NEWS
ALSO IF YOU WOULD LIKE TO SPOUT OFF ABOUT THE FACTOR FROM
